patterns.comment: Begin Packed Switch, no idea what literal limit is for these. Have seen up to 0x7f090005

annotation-access.comment: accessFlags property in annotation. Haven't seen any of these go over 0x4019.

annotation-end.comment: Parsing this is hard to do right. This is Good Enough™.

annotation-value.comment: This is another hack because sublime can't handle multi-line regex, particulaly for 'end'.

directive-method-parameter-end.comment: Parsing this is hard to do right. This is Good Enough™.

field-end.comment: Parsing this is hard to do right. This is Good Enough™.

opcode-format-35c-meth.comment: Format: op {vC, vD, vE, vF, vG}, meth@BBBB

opcode-format-35c-type.comment: Format: op {vC, vD, vE, vF, vG}, type@BBBB
